TIDY5E.Exhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws

TIDY5E.Settings.UseExpandedSheet.name: Expanded View for the Limited Sheet.
TIDY5E.Settings.UseExpandedSheet.hint: The expanded view for the limited sheet displays the entire character sheet (minus the Private Notes tab) to players with Limited permission for that actor.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseDarkMode.name: Use alternate dark mode.
TIDY5E.Settings.UseDarkMode.hint: Checking this option will enable an alternate Dark Mode version of the Tidy5e Sheet.

TIDY5E.Settings.PrimaryAccentColor.name: Primary accent color.
TIDY5E.Settings.PrimaryAccentColor.hint: Overwrite the default primary accent color (default: #ff6400/darkmode: #48BB78) used to highlight e. g. buttons, input field borders or hover states. Use any valid css value like red/#ff0000/rgba(255,0,0)/rgba(255,0,0,1).

TIDY5E.Settings.SecondaryAccentColor.name: Secondary accent color.
TIDY5E.Settings.SecondaryAccentColor.hint: Overwrite the default secondary accent color (default: rgba(210,0,255,.1)/darkmode: rgba(0,150,150,.325)) used to highlight preparation states. Use any valid css value like red/#ff0000/rgba(255,0,0)/rgba(255,0,0,1).

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysPreparedAccentColo.name: Accent Color for Always Prepared Spells.
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysPreparedAccentColo.hint: Overwrite the default accent color (default: rgba(210,0,255,.1)/darkmode: rgba(0,150,150,.325)) for Always Prepared Spells. Use any valid css value like red/#ff0000/rgba(255,0,0)/rgba(255,0,0,1).

TIDY5E.Settings.UseRoundPortraits.name: Sheets use round portraits.
TIDY5E.Settings.UseRoundPortraits.hint: You should check this if you use round portraits. It will adapt the hp overlay and portait buttons to make it look nicer. Also looks nice on square portraits without a custom frame.

TIDY5E.Settings.HpOverlayBorder.name: Border width for the hit point overlay.
TIDY5E.Settings.HpOverlayBorder.hint: If your portrait has a frame you can adjust the Hit Point overlay to compensate the frame width. It might look nicer if the overlay doesn't tint the border.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableHpOverlay.name: Disable the hit point overlay.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableHpOverlay.hint: If you don't like the video game style Hit Point overlay on your character's portrait you can disable it.

TIDY5E.Settings.HideClassList.name: Hide character class list.
TIDY5E.Settings.HideClassList.hint: Checking this option will hide the character's class list next to the level label. The sheet can handle 3 classes well, more than that will work but things get shifty ;)

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspirationAnimat.name: No inspiration indicator animation.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspirationAnimat.hint: If it's too distracting, you can disable the subtle animation of the glowing inspiration indicator.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspiration.name: Disable Inspiration Tracker.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspiration.hint: If your campaign doesn't use inspiration you can disable the tracker completely.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableExhaustion.name: Disable Exhaustion Tracker.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableExhaustion.hint: If your campaign doesn't use exhaustion you can disable the tracker completely.

TIDY5E.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide Exhaustion and Inspiration when not available (0).
TIDY5E.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Check this option if you want to hide Exhaustion if its level is 0 and Inspiration if you have none. Appears on hover.

TIDY5E.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.name: Show exhaustion tracker only on hover.
TIDY5E.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.hint: If you check this option the exhaustion tracker will only be visible when you hover over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.InspirationOnHover.name: Show inspiration indicator only on hover.
TIDY5E.Settings.InspirationOnHover.hint: If you check this option the inspiration indicator will only be visible when you hover over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.RestOnHover.name: Show rest button on hover.
TIDY5E.Settings.RestOnHover.hint: If you check this option the rest button will only be visible when you hover over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.MoveTraits.name: Move traits below resources.
TIDY5E.Settings.MoveTraits.hint: Check this if you want to show the traits below the resources.

TIDY5E.Settings.PcToggleTraits.name: Show Toggle button for character traits.
TIDY5E.Settings.PcToggleTraits.hint: Check this if you want to show a button to toggle empty traits.

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowTraits.name: Always show traits.
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowTraits.hint: When you don't want to hide and toggle empty NPC traits tick this box.

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.name: Always show skills.
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.hint: When you don't want to hide and toggle not proficient NPC skills tick this box.

TIDY5E.Settings.MarkLinked.name: Highlight Sheet when linked to Actor.
TIDY5E.Settings.MarkLinked.hint: When you find yourself editing the wrong NPC Sheet you can have linked sheets visually highlighted.

TIDY5E.Settings.MarkUnlinked.name: Highlight sheet when not linked to actor.
TIDY5E.Settings.MarkUnlinked.hint: When you find yourself editing the wrong NPC Sheet you can have unlinked sheets visually highlighted.
